info.title: verifiablecredentials
info.description: Issues Verifiable Credentials. Part of the Portable Identity Card Services.

post.description: Given a contract with a set of predefined rules, this operation accepts multiple types of attestations and issues the corresponding Verifiable Credential.

parameters.name: issuanceRequest
parameters.description: An RFC7519 JSON Web Token whose body is an IssuanceRequestBody object. Must be signed by the intended subject of the Verifiable Credential.

200.description: A Verifiable Credential RFC7519 JSON Web Token.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

IssuanceRequestBody.description: The body of the JWT used to issue a Verifiable Credential.

contract.description: Full URL of the contract with the rules needed to issue the VerifiableCredential.

selfIssued.description: Self-attested claims specified in the Verifiable Credential contract.

idTokens.description: IdToken claims specified in the Verifiable Credential contract. These are expected in the form of RFC7519 JSON Web Tokens

verifiableCredentials.description: Verifiable Presentation claims specified in the Verifiable Credential contract. These are expected in the form of Verifiable Presentation RFC7519 JSON Web Tokens.

sub_jwk.description: RFC 7517 Json Web Key used to sign the request.

IssuanceResponse.description: Payload containing an issued Verifiable Credential.

vc.description: An RFC7519 JSON Web Token structure whose body is a VerifiableCredential object.

PortableIdentityCardError.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

message.description: In detail description of why the error occurred.

innerError.description: Nested error object containing more information with an arbitrary structure.

ApiVersion.name: apiVersion
ApiVersion.description: Issuance API version. Current version is v1.0.
